comment: His test are super hard for no reason at all. You have to do so much in such a little time. I don't see the point of his teachings in correlation with the tests. It doesn't help that his lectures were super boring an drug out. His PowerPoints/study guide were not very helpful at all either. Glad it was his last year teaching. Wouldn't take again.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Dr Voogt is extremely knowledgable, has a great rapport with his class, and is greatly respected. I learned so much in Hist3305, I highly recommend this professor and this class. A good, fun challenging course that puts a lot of context to our world.

Professor Voogt is boring, unwilling to help, and AWFUL at responding to emails. His classes consist of reading word for word off of a powerpoint that he rarely posted to D2L. His tests are very detailed and contain maybe 10% of what the study guide says to study. Avoid this prof if at all possible.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Just do your part and you will do fine. The tests are mostly over his lectures, so attendance is important. The quizzes are all ten questions and multiple choice, as long as you paid attention and read the chapter, its a breeze. He's a nice guy and he's passionate about the subject. I don't understand why the negativity.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: The lectures were just so-so, but I don't understand some of the negative comments complaining there were a lot of quizzes and you had to read in order to do well on them. Duh!! It was on the syllabus that there would be quizzes. And if you don't do the reading, it's your fault, not the professor's.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Lots of quizzes over powerpoints he hasn't gone over. 10 questions on every quiz but if you miss 2 questions, you get a 79 somehow. Three main test. Final isn't cumulative.

Professor Voogt tries to make the class interesting but it is pretty boring overall. If you do not read the book, there's a high chance that you will not pass the tests or the class in general. There are many quizzes and two tests then the final.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!! He gives many quizzes and they are super detailed, probably more detailed than it is in the book. If you don't read the book, you will not pass. There are 2 tests and many quizzes (DETAILED) and then the final. He tries to make the class interesting but it is boring.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Professor Voogt is really kind and cool. If you do not show up to the class then you are more than likely not going to do good on the test and quizzes. He also gives a ton of quizzes and informs you the day before about it. You have to read a lot in this class. If you do not read then you will not pass.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY
